title: Shift
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204202541/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204202541/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Shift**

Shift is a San Francisco Bay Area type foundry founded in 1995 by principal designer [Joshua Distler](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204202541/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joshua%20Distler).
